pages.text: $(li)The Shroomlight is a source light block that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/crimson_forest)Crimson Forests$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/warped_forest)Warped Forests$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/warped_toad)Warped Toads$(/l) may drop this block upon death.
$(li)They can be used to craft $(l)Crimson Lanterns$() and $(l)Lamps$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
